detail_desc: Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. One large outer compartment at the front and one inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 4.5x16.5x22 cm.

Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. One large outer compartment at the front and one inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 4.5x16.5x22 cm.

Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow tie at the top and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Sewn-on waistcoat in woven fabric with a decorative chest pocket and buttons down the front.
Small shoulder bag in imitation suede with a metal chain and imitation suede shoulder strap and flap with a braided detail and concealed magnetic fastener. Two compartments. Lined. Size 5x13x21 cm.
Small shoulder bag in imitation suede with a metal chain and imitation suede shoulder strap and flap with a braided detail and concealed magnetic fastener. Two compartments. Lined. Size 5x13x21 cm.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather. Flap with appliqués, plastic beads, metal studs and a metal snap lock, and a narrow shoulder strap with a chain fastening. The bag is divided into two inside and has a small inner compartment. Size approx. 8x14x19 cm.
Rigid clutch bag in a jute and cotton weave with a metal rim around the opening, a snap lock and narrow chain shoulder strap. Twill lining with elastic along the short side. Size 6x10x16 cm.
Sturdy clutch bag in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a metal snap lock at the top and narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 5x9x18 cm,.
Small bucket bag in soft suede with a drawstring and narrow shoulder strap in leather at the top. Concealed magnetic fastening and one inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 12x16x17 cm.
Small bucket bag in soft suede with a drawstring and narrow shoulder strap in leather at the top. Concealed magnetic fastening and one inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 12x16x17 cm.
Bag in soft suede with a flap, magnetic fastener and fixed shoulder strap. Unlined. Size 8.5x14x16.5 cm.
Small suede shoulder bag with a metal chain and suede shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 5x13x21 cm.

Small bucket bag with a suede upper section and a lower section in braided water hyacinth. One zipped inner compartment and a magnetic press-stud fastening at the top. The bag has a long metal shoulder strap but can also be carried as a handbag. Lined. Size 9x16.5x23 cm.

Small bucket bag with a suede upper section and a lower section in braided water hyacinth. One zipped inner compartment and a magnetic press-stud fastening at the top. The bag has a long metal shoulder strap but can also be carried as a handbag. Lined. Size 9x16.5x23 cm.

Metal chain necklace with a plastic pendant.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with unlined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide elastic trim at the hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Small shoulder bag in sturdy, glittery imitation leather with appliqués and embroidery. Narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end, and a flap with a hook and loop fastening. Lined. Size 3x7x11 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a drawstring hood, V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide trousers in soft cashmere with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
